summary: Use this API to delete the product。(CrossBoarderSellersOnly)
description: Use this API to delete the product。(CrossBoarderSellersOnly)

query.name: country
query.description: country,if type is "global", this field will be ignored

query.name: product_id
query.description: When type is "global", it is the global product ID, when type is "single", product id is the IC product ID.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/global/delete')
request.add_api_parameter("type", "global/single")
request.add_api_parameter("country", "SG/VN/PH/TH/MY")
request.add_api_parameter("product_id", "1234  \t")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/global/delete')
request.add_api_param('type', 'global/single')
request.add_api_param('country', 'SG/VN/PH/TH/MY')
request.add_api_param('product_id', '1234  \t')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: data
schema.description: bodydeleteGspProductResult is truemean update gsp product success。when deleteICProductResult is falsemean update IC product failand deleteIcProductFailResultList will show the reason

schema.name: success
schema.description: process resultIf this is true, it doesn't mean that everything is processed successfully
